channel.title: Posts on my site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on my site

item.title: Python
item.description: hailey_dict = {'firstName': 'Hailey', 'lastName': 'Orton', 'hobbies': ['F45','long walks','cooking'], 'occupation': ['student', 'vision therapist'], 'age': 22} print(hailey_dict) ## {'firstName': 'Hailey', 'lastName': 'Orton', 'hobbies': ['F45', 'long walks', 'cooking'], 'occupation': ['student', 'vision therapist'], 'age': 22} print(hailey_dict.keys()) ## dict_keys(['firstName', 'lastName', 'hobbies', 'occupation', 'age']) library(reticulate) py$hailey_dict['hobbies'] ## $hobbies ## [1] "F45" "long walks" "cooking" py$hailey_dict['lastName'] ## $lastName ## [1] "Orton"
